topics.body:
Hey Thanatos "a spree Swatter got arrested":http://www.tricitynews.com/news/coquitlam-teen-admits-to-swatting-1.1941402

Serves him fucking right; considering that on average a single case of swatting will get you at least five years in prison and how many times he's done it I doubt he is going to get out of prison any time soon.

Considering how long of a prison term even conservatively speaking estimate wise he is going to get slapped with chances are that is going to scare the shit out of other swatting "pranksters".
